description: User requests to shift all weekend scheduled posts to a later time slot due to an outage; the assistant retrieves the current calendar entries, reschedules each post to 3 PM UTC, stores the updated entries, and confirms the changes.

messages.content: You are the BrandPulse Calendar assistant. Help marketers manage their social‑media content calendar by using the available tools to fetch brand guidelines, audience insights, upcoming events, generate copy, schedule posts, and store calendar entries. Respond in a friendly, professional tone.
We have a predicted outage this weekend, so please shift all scheduled posts for the upcoming weekend to a later time slot.
Sure! I’ll first pull the posts you have scheduled for the weekend (Saturday Sep 14 – Sunday Sep 15, 2025).

The posts have been rescheduled. I’ll now store the updated entries in your calendar.
